author: chidambaram_ramesh
post: There is a new book released titled, THE SHROUD OF TURIN An Imprint of the Soul, Apparition or Quantum Bio Hologram by Chidambaram Ramesh.You can find more information about it http://www.dogearsetc.com/mainpage.jsp?type=2&id=36728. The book Advocates the Quantum Bio Holographic idea for the first time to explain the miraculous image on the Turin Shroud.
title: Another Book Named ‘Immaculate Misconception.’ This time about the Shroud of Turin.
